headline: Republicans Already Discussing Possibility Of Impeaching Biden After The Midterms
author: Mike LaChance
sentences:
“You have to have complete buy-in from the entire conference and the leadership of our conference.”
Trending: Democrats Terrified By Possibility Of Republicans Taking Back House And Senate Then Reelecting Trump
“Just look at the border,” Jordan said about the more than two million migrants have been apprehended at the southern border.

Breitbart News reports:
Top Republicans Consider Impeaching Joe Biden After Midterm Elections
Top Republicans are speaking about potentially impeaching President Joe Biden if they successfully retake both congressional chambers.
If an impeachment trial does ensue, Jordan would head the House Judiciary Committee’s hearing of the impeachment case before potentially conveying the articles of impeachment of the Senate.

“The president of the United States is supposed to enforce the laws along the border and they’re not doing it.”

His handling of the southern border, the disastrous withdrawal from Afghanistan that left Americans behind, and on and on.
